title: Ticket #1557: Gridmanager needs to strip port from nordugrid resource names for ldap
description: When the GridResource attribute for a nordugrid job includes the port of the server, the gridmanager needs to strip off that port when issuing ldap query commands to the nordugrid_gahp. Otherwise, the gahp will try to connect to the gsiftp service for the ldap query, which ends up in a deadlock.
